commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff* Perfect weather for training, isn't it? Huh...?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Zzz...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: K-Kanata?! What in the world are you thinking, lying down in a place like this?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Yawn* Oh, hi Umi. I'm just taking a nap.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The weather is gorgeous today, right? I was looking for a place to rest and came across this bench. Between the breeze and the shade, it's a perfect nap spot.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Goodness gracious. I realize that's just like you, but wouldn't you rather get up and exercise when the weather's so nice?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Huh? Hey, it's Umi and Kanata.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You're right, zura! Hey there!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yoshiko and Hanamaru! Hello to you as well. What are you two doing here? Is Aqours putting on a live show?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It's not Yoshiko, it's Yohane! Anyways, I received word that my favorite black magic shop stocked up on some new items, so I came from afar to see their wares.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I have no idea what you're talking about. Hanamaru, don't tell me you're here to buy magic items, too?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: No, I'm here for books, zura. I figured the bookstores in Tokyo are so much bigger, they might have what I'm looking for. So I asked Yoshiko to take me with her, zura.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I thought we'd have to try a few stores, but I found exactly what I was looking for at the very first one! I love Tokyo. You can find anything you want here, zura!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That's great! So you two have just been shopping the whole time?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: No, we actually finished shopping pretty quickly. We were at an internet cafe for a while, reading comics and surfing the web.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Internet cafe? That's where you've been all day?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Yup. Zuramaru said she'd never been to one, so I showed her what she's been missing.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: The "internet cafe" was fascinating. There were so many computers and lots of drinks to choose from. Tokyo really is the city of the future, zura.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Aren't there internet cafes in Numazu, too?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Wow, talk about your odd pairings. What are you all doing here together?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Eli!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: We just happened to run into each other. My little demons always seem to find their way back to their master, even when we're separated.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I'm pretty sure that none of us here ever agreed to become little demons, zura.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Eli, why are you dressed like that? Did you go to school today?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Yeah. I've been stuck in the student council room all day. I haven't even had time to practice or anything lately, so I figured I'd take a little walk to get some exercise.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh, wow. You're really dedicated to be working on a day off, but at least you can relax now, zura.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Personally, I'd recommend a nice nap.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Yohane intends to return to the net cafe. Do you want to come with us, Eli? You need to get your mind off work!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Thanks a bunch. Let's see, I suppose I could...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Denied!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: This... This is absolutely not okay!
